Title: Grow Fast or Die Slow
Writer: Ron Weiner, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by), Andrew Law (executive story editor), Rachele Lynn (executive story editor), Shawn Boxe (story editor), Meghan Pleticha (staff writer)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, Josh Brener, Martin Starr, Kumail Nanjiani
Plot: Richard faces new challenges as a leader as Pied Piper levels up; Gavin worries about being antiquated.
